data.convo: That is the most beautiful sunset ! Let's stop the car and enjoy it for a minute . Here is a good place . Let's get out . Wow . We don't get to see this in the city ! Mother Nature is quite an artist . Look behind us at the mountains ! They're reflecting pink ! Amazing . The sun is almost gone and yet there is still color everywhere ! Where is our camera ? Let's see if we can catch this on film !
